DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Efficacy Acupuncture Adjunct Methadone Treatment Services Heroin Addicts
DOC.detailed_description: Methadone maintenance therapy treatment heroin addict 40 year , many study confirm effectiveness , reduce heroin addiction , reduce high-risk needle use , reduce criminal activity . But methadone also side effect drowsiness , constipation , insomnia , nausea , vomiting , sweat respiratory depression.Then long-term heroin addict may irregular take methadone , increase risk reuse heroin drug . Since 1996 , World Health Organization ( WHO ) classify acupuncture treatment indication , include drug abuse . The purpose study investigate efficacy acupuncture therapy combine standard methadone maintenance therapy heroin addict . The study consist 60 heroin addict inclusion criterion : ( 1 ) age 20 year ; ( 2 ) fulfil Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition criterion opiate dependence receive methadone maintenance treatment one month . Subjects exclude : ( 1 ) concurrent treatment antidepressant neuroleptic medication ; ( 2 ) take acupuncture treatment past 30 day ; ( 3 ) severe adverse effect event history receive acupuncture treatment ; ( 4 ) serious physical illness ; ( 5 ) significant risk suicide ; ( 6 ) ear infection ; ( 7 ) pregnant woman plan pregnant ; ( 8 ) bleeding disorder take anticoagulant drug ; ( 9 ) Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) positive ; ( 10 ) epilepsy , cerebral vascular disease brain injure history.The study use randomize , placebo-controlled study design . Patients randomly assign receive methadone verum acupuncture condition ( n = 30 ) , methadone sham acupuncture condition ( n = 30 ) . Treatments offer 2 time weekly 4 week . Weekly measure methadone dosage use visual analog scale ( VAS ) ass crave severity 4 week . Using Short Form Health Survey ( SF-36 ) Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index ( PSQI ) provide assessment quality life sleep quality previous 4 week . The study hypothesis acupuncture clinical efficacy upon crave severity , life quality , reduce methadone dosage sleep quality provide adjunct standard methadone maintenance treatment .
